name: Conquer the World.io
description:
Play against other people online and conquer the world by occupying all bases in the world (neutral and enemies)

Lead the main army and destroy all your opponents.

RULES :

The bigger army always wins the fight
Collect armies(points) from conquered bases.
If you occupy all the bases in the world then you win the server.
If you lose the main army then you lose the game !!!!!

MUTLIPLAYER GAME:

The application requires an internet connection

We offer best gaming experience inspired io type games .
